login.description: Performs a login to the remote backend

logout.description: Performs a logout of the remote backend

isAlive.description: Performs a keep alive ping and returns whether the session is alive. A rejection can differentiate between connection/server down or session lost

getQuota.description: Retrieves the global disk usage quota and the global maximum request size

returns.description: The global disk usage quota and the global maximum request size

loggedIn.description: This event is fired when the login process completed successfully

loggedOut.description: This event is fired when there is a user logout request

failure.description: This event is fired when there is a communication error
